WorkItem.Description: It would really nice to have the watching/compiling work recursive like how coffeescript does, compiling dozens of files manually in annoy (even though there are command line things you can do) or having to restart watching when you add a file.

Comments.Message: Definitely a big improvement for a language that targets large scale project. I worked on a project with TypeScript and my first job was to create an Ant command to do this job TypeScript doesn't make : https://github.com/tekool/puremvc-typescript-demo-employeeadmin/blob/master/build/build.xml.
